description: Ever-expansive thickets, foxtails, burrs, and everything else that sticks and threatens to rip has got nothing on the Jackson Ridge™ Long Sleeve Shirt. Durable cotton canvas is up to every campground challenge—from cutting and carrying wood to sitting on root-riddled dirt. We upgraded the fit too, keeping it functional yet sleek enough to wear back in town. Warm on its own, layer it up with your favorite flannel to bring the heritage vibe home.
name: Mountain Hardwear Jackson Ridge LS Shirt - Mens
